span.span: Your future. Your path. Your choice.

div.style: border-width:2px 2px 2px 2px;border-style:solid solid solid solid;border-color:rgba(39, 59, 123, 1) rgba(39, 59, 123, 1) rgba(39, 59, 123, 1) rgba(39, 59, 123, 1);border-radius:0 0 0 0;overflow:hidden;transform:translateZ(0);position:relative;height:100%;width:100%;margin:-2px

div.p: Explore Academy is a tuition-free, college preparatory middle-high school which provides each student with a personalized educational experience through the power of student choice. Through an elective-based approach to learning, each student creates a learning pathway that is personalized and unique.

p.span: The innovation of the Explore Learning model is built on the principles of strong core education and college readiness through the philosophy of academic choice. The school's innovation is based on the premise that individuals best succeed when they are internally motivated through the power of personal choice, and that by offering a customized educational system where they can create their own curricular pathways, all students will show greater levels of success.

div.style: border-width:2px 2px 2px 2px;border-style:solid solid solid solid;border-color:rgba(39, 59, 123, 1) rgba(39, 59, 123, 1) rgba(39, 59, 123, 1) rgba(39, 59, 123, 1);border-radius:0 0 0 0;box-shadow:0 0 4px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 1);overflow:hidden;transform:translateZ(0);position:relative;height:100%;width:100%;margin:-2px

span.span: We are always available to answer your questions and provide information. Feel free to reach out to us through the contact form here, on our social media pages, or through email. We look forward to speaking to you!

div.p: Close your browser completely and then reopen the site
